rukus.text: ane ame musa a.Sa.Ne amari nisani'o la'ine phira'auna ane tena loko tarapha mokalya, to (musa a.Sa.E ja'ine) kahyum ke, hum samagra srstina palanaharano payagambara chum
basa! Jyare te'o amari nisani'o la'ine te'one pase pahoncya, to te'o temani maskari karava lagya
ane je nisani ame te'one batavata hata, te ekabijathi cadhiyati hati ane ame temana para prakopa utaryo, jethi te'o sudharo kari le
ane te loko'e kahyum ke, he jadugara! Amara mate potana palanaharathi tena mate du'a kara, jenum vacana amane apyum che, ni:Sanka ame satya marga para avi ja'isum
pachi jyare ame temana parathi te prakopa dura kari didho, te'o'e te ja vakhate temanum vacana todi nankhyum
ane phira'aune potani komamam jahera karavyum ane kahyum ke he mari komana loko! Sum misranum sahera marum nathi? Ane mara (mahelo) nice a nahero vahi rahi che, sum tame jota nathi
parantu hum te tuccha vyakti karata srestha chum ane (te) spasta boli pana nathi sakato
sarum, to tena mate sonani bangadi'o kema na utari? Athava teni sathe pratisthita pharista'o kema na avya
tene potani komane pathabhrasta kari didha ane te loko'e tenum ja anusarana karyum, kharekhara a badha avajnakari loko hata
Pachi jyare te'o'e amane gus'se karya, to ame temani sathe badalo lidho ane saune dubadi didha
basa! Ame te lokone bekara kari didha ane pachala avanara loko mate nisani banavi didha
